description: Details required for Conditions 4 (Construction Management Plan) and 15 (PEA) of planning permission 23/01059/FUL (Demolition of dwelling and erection of 1no. 3 bed replacement dwelling, and erection of 3no. 4 bed dwellings to rear with new access road)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The information submitted pursuant to Condition 15 (Biodiversity Enhancements) is vague and does not demonstrate what biodiversity enhancements would be implemented or where. The submission is lacking in detail and does not provide a robust scheme which would be implemented contrary to the requirements of the condition and Policy G6 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies CS3 and DM6 of the Kingston Core Strategy (2012).
